bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXVIII (Nos 2481-2505)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXVIII (Nos 2481-2505). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 40.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1962, 8°, [xii]-89 pp., XI plates.

C.R. par W.M. Calder III, CP 60 (1965) 222-223. - Ll.W. Daly, AJP 87 (1966) pp. 244-246. - S. Daris, Aegyptus 43 (1963) pp. 200-201. - É. des Places, Orientalia N.S., 33 (1964) p. 325. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 39 (1964) Nos 77-78, pp. 194-199. - Kl. Stiewe, GGA 216 (1964) pp. 107-114. - Ed. Volterra, Iura 14 (1963) pp. 351-359. - P. Walcot, JHS 85 (1965) pp. 196-197. - M. West, Gnomon 35 (1963) pp. 752-759.
